entries.content: Hi BigStar, I have 10K in savings currently in an investment account. My goal is to earn a passive income of $10K every month. Can you please provide a tailored plan for me that will meet this goal? Please consider my risk tolerance and financial situation when creating the plan. I would appreciate specific, brief instructions for carrying out this plan, including recommended stocks or asset allocation percentages if possible. Thank you!

Hi there! I'd be happy to help you create a tailored plan for earning a passive income of $10K per month from your current savings. To provide specific recommendations, I would need some more information about your financial situation and risk tolerance. However, I can give you some general guidelines on how to approach this goal
